original_title: The Better Way Back to the Soil
overview: A minimalist prose poem in cinematographic terms, crafted from nothing but the titles of lost movies: The Man Who Disappeared, Somewhere in Politics, Under Two Flags. A black screen, thereon the titles and production dates: thatâ€™s all Hirakawa Youki needs to evoke a lost continent.
title: The Better Way Back to the Soil
